content: *add bold sophistication to your baby s room with this adorable baby blanket * the xo blanket is a feast for the eyes combining classic granny squares with an eye-catching color palette use all-natural happy place yarn 50% wool 50% cotton for a blanket they can love for a lifetime *pattern includes a helpful video tutorial to practice granny squares pattern also includes a chart for the granny square and border rounds * **materials** -dk weight yarn in one main color and 4 coordinating colors -5mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry needle -steam blocking supplies **techniques** -classic granny sqauares -crochet color changes -crochet motif assembly -adding a border to crochet blankets **measurements** one size - 41 square **find the free version of the xo blanket ** here 1 ** ** // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 http //tlycblog com/xo-blanket-a-free-granny-square-baby-blanket-pattern
